text.name: longdescription
text.text: The NAOMI (New Arcade Operation Machine Idea) was designed as a successor to Sega Model 3 hardware. CPU Hitachi SH-4 32-bit RISC @200MHz, 32MB RAM, 16MB Vd.RAM, 8MB Snd.RAM, GP 100MHz PowerVR2, Sound 45MHz Yamaha AICA 32-bit ARM7 RISC CPU core, 64 ch. Release date '98.
